com.ucloud.ulive.filter

Class UGPUImageCompat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ucloud.ulive.filter.UVideoGPUFilter
      • com.ucloud.ulive.filter.UGPUImageCompat
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ULookupGPUFilter, USkinBeautyGPUFilter, USkinBeautyGPUFilterEx

    public class UGPUImageCompat
extends UVideoGPUFilter
    android-gpuimage 兼容类
    只需要将原继承类修改成继承自UGPUImageCompat即可直接使用
